query.name: list
query.comment: Get the list of tickets that the current user can update
query.sql: SELECT ticket.id, ticket.ident, ticket.summary, ticket.priority, ticket.create_date, ticket.update_date, ticket.status, ticket.ticket_type, ticket.duration, ticket.progress, user.name FROM jason_ticket AS ticket INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = ticket.project_id AND acl.entity_type = :project_table AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[ticket-update] INNER JOIN awa_user AS user ON ticket.creator_id = user.id WHERE ticket.project_id = :project_id AND :ticket_filter ORDER BY :order1 LIMIT :count OFFSET :first
query.sql-count: SELECT count(ticket.id) FROM jason_ticket AS ticket INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = ticket.project_id AND acl.entity_type = :project_table AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[ticket-update] WHERE ticket.project_id = :project_id AND :ticket_filter

query.name: list-tag-filter

query.sql: SELECT ticket.id, ticket.ident, ticket.summary, ticket.priority, ticket.create_date, ticket.update_date, ticket.status, ticket.ticket_type, user.name FROM jason_ticket AS ticket INNER JOIN awa_tagged_entity AS e ON e.for_entity_id = ticket.project_id AND e.entity_type = :ticket_table AND e.tag_id = :tag INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = ticket.id AND acl.entity_type = :project_table AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[ticket-update] INNER JOIN awa_user AS user ON ticket.creator_id = user.id WHERE ticket.project_id = :project_id AND :ticket_filter ORDER BY :order1 LIMIT :count OFFSET :first
query.sql-count: SELECT count(ticket.id) FROM jason_ticket AS ticket INNER JOIN awa_tagged_entity AS e ON e.for_entity_id = ticket.project_id AND e.entity_type = :ticket_table AND e.tag_id = :tag INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = ticket.id AND acl.entity_type = :project_table AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[ticket-update] WHERE ticket.project_id = :project_id AND :ticket_filter
